description: In this playful yet intense opening scene, Lana Violet wrestles with James Deen in an attempt to get free. Overpowered and exhausted from struggling, she falls into submission and receives a firm punishment. She is tied up in various positions including a unique suspension and fucked thoroughly. Then, in shackles and chains attached to a heavy iron ball, she gets tormented with water. After one last fuck and getting covered in cum, she is locked away in a cage and rewarded with a vibrator that makes her squirt.
title: Struggle and Takedown
